title: CODE X: Episode 1
description: Did Mankind Advance Alone?   Why Could So Few Change The History of The World?    or Did They Have Help?    Why was there an Einstein, daVinci, Hawking?    George Washington led from the front line, but was never wounded. How was that possible?   Code XFinds the Answers    Prepare to be Shocked!  Dr. Vicki Collins won the Nobel Prize for Genetic Engineering before she was 30. Now the world's giant medical corporations want her to work for them, and they will stop at nothing to get her. Nick Parks, Vicki’s fiancé, discovers the truth about the lies, deceit, money and even murder they use to succeed. He will risk everything, even his own life to try and save her. A romance every woman would want  Can the Forces of Evil be Stopped or Will They Rule the World?     A page turning roller coaster ride, you can not put down.
author: M.R. Vallone
